Class NonPerishableProduct

java.lang.Object
model.Product
model.NonPerishableProduct
Direct Known Subclasses:
GeneralAndSpecialty, HouseholdAndPet, Toiletries
public abstract class NonPerishableProduct extends Product
An abstract subclass for products that do not expire. This class is now a "marker" class, as brand/variant are handled by the base Product class.

  • Constructor Details

    • NonPerishableProduct

      public NonPerishableProduct(String productID, String name, double price, int quantityInStock, List<String> subcategories, String brand, String variant)
      Constructs a new NonPerishableProduct.
      Parameters:
      productID - (String) The unique ID for the product.
      name - (String) The display name for the product.
      price - (double) The retail price of the product.
      quantityInStock - (int) The number of units in stock.
      subcategories - (List) A list of category tags.
      brand - (String) The brand name of the product.
      variant - (String) The variant of the product.

  • Method Details

    • displayDetails

      public String displayDetails()
      Generates a detailed display string. This method just calls the super implementation, as NonPerishableProduct adds no new details.
      Overrides:
      displayDetails in class Product
      Returns:
      (String) A formatted string with all product details.
